int swap_add(int* xp, int* yp) {
int x = *xp;
int y = *xp;
*xp = y;
*yp = x;
return x + y;
}

int caller() {
int arg1 = 534;
int arg2 = 1057;
int sum = swap_add(&arg1, &arg2);
int diff = arg1 - arg2;
return sum * diff;
}
